hero.title: Software Engineer, Building AI-centric solutions.
hero.description: As a software engineer, my capabilities were showcased during my internship, where I significantly contributed to redeveloping an internal portal for a department. Additionally, I played a key role in testing a new feature within an app built on a major financial system, during which I identified three critical bugs. Independently, I also developed a Power BI dashboard to enhance the visualization of internal data. For My graduation project, "Muhtm," it is an AI-based tool for in-depth sentiment analysis of customer reviews, aiding business owners in product evaluation.

quote.text: Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out. -Chris Pine

about.title: about
description: I’m a self-taught front-end developer based in Kyiv, Ukraine. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.

Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a year. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
